goal: Design and evolve PML into a practical DSL that compiles to Python for large, long-lived systems.

phases.name: spec_bootstrap
phases.prompt: Refine the core PML spec in pml_spec.md: syntax, core constructs, and guiding principles.

phases.name: compiler_bootstrap
phases.prompt: Design or refine the Python-based compiler/runtime that turns PML into Python modules.

phases.name: examples_and_tests
phases.prompt: Add or refine PML examples and tests that demonstrate realistic systems.
